abort.single_instance_allowed: Already configured. Only a single configuration possible.

error.directory_does_not_exist: The directory could not be reached. Please check your settings.

user.description: Select a location to get to store downloads. The setup will check if the directory exists.

directory_does_not_exist.description:
The {integration_title} integration failed to import because the configured directory does not exist.

Ensure the directory exists and restart KS Assistant to try again or remove the {integration_title} configuration from your configuration.yaml file and continue to [set up the integration]({url}) manually.
directory_does_not_exist.title: The {integration_title} failed to import

download_file.description: Downloads a file to the download location.

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite the file or not.
overwrite.name: Overwrite

url.description: The URL of the file to download.
url.name: URL

download_file.name: Download file
